评论详情: This dress is well made and the fabric is a a substantial weight with just enough stretch. It has a subtle sheen which mimics the look of a heavy silk. I love the fact that the fabric isn’t thin. The cut is very form fitting- more than I like so I ordered one size up and it fits very well. It is snug with stretch but not so tight as to show every lump. I usually wear a 8-10 petite dresses so I ordered a L and it fits right. It is very snug across the tummy and will accentuate this area. The top portion may be too large if you have narrow shoulders and small tatas. The sleeves are slim fit which is nice. I love the retro look , the length ,and the slimming proportions. Fabric may be too heavy for summer, although I ordered one in light blue for next spring since I get chilled in A/C. I’m very happy with the deep navy for fall and winter.

This dress is classy. The dress is true to color.  I  bought both my size and one size up. The one that is my actual size was not tight because the fabric has stretch to it, but it did hug my body and I didn’t like that. The one that was one size bigger, gave me the room my body needed so it didn’t feel like it was hugging my body. It felt perfect. The 3/4 sleeves gave me the coverage I wanted. The length was perfect right below my knee, so I didn’t have to hem it. I liked it so much I’m buying it in various colors for every season.  I know it says you can wash it, but I won’t. Instead, I’ll dry clean it.  I love that it has a V neck both on front and back. I am 5’3” and weigh 163. I normally wear a Size12/14 or a L/XL. I bought both the XL and it hugged my lower half. I ordered the XXL and it fit perfect. I wish the dress was lined and not of stretch fabric, but it’s not. The colors are vibrant and it fits well and is very versatile. I feel this dress can be worn for ANY occasion. I highly recommend this dress if you want to look and feel classy.

评论概述: Stunning dress, just needs some adjusting
评论详情: I love this dress. The fabric is a nice quality and it stretches so I don’t feel stuffed in it (even though I had gained a few pounds.) The green is rich and I get lots of compliments when I wear it.  What I don’t like though is that all along the bust line the fabric doesn’t seem to be stitched. So the fabric rolls out so there isn’t a nice edge. I have to use lots of magic tape it so it won’t buckle out. If I was handy perhaps I could glue of stitch this fabric together. (It’s like they folded the fabric under and then pressed it.)  Other than that, it’s a fabulous dress!

This dress is wonderful, I have never had one like it, I love it. It will make you look sophisticated and feminine. I liked. More products, I chose the white color but it is actually more of a wonderful pearl color. The fabric is semi-elastic and highlights exactly what you want to highlight. The collar is lined and wide. It is not glued in the center. You can easily shape your cufflinks and adapt it to your taste. I don't like to show much but it makes you feel divine. The bottom is slightly transparent but not too much. The dress weighs nothing, is comfortable and light. The fabric is resistant. Quality finishes, nothing tight; I recommend that you buy a larger size. I am 1.56 centimeters tall and weigh 84 kilos. I normally wear size L but I ordered an XL and it was the best. I recommend that you order a size larger than what you wear. I will order more in different colors.

The dress fits great, flattering. It was very comfortable, stretchy material. I wore it for an outdoor wedding and it was perfect, material is a little thick. I'm 5'4, 125 lbs. I bought small, true to size.

评论概述: The Perfect Dress For That Special Occasion
评论详情: OMG! This dress is everything! I purchased the black to wear to a special event.  It was a perfect fit.  It accentuated my curves perfectly.  I receive so many compliments and inquiries as to "where did you get the dress?". Lol! I'll never tell,  I am 5ft 3in, 128 lbs and size small was just right.  I order the gray and red.  What I like most about the dress is the quality fabric.  If I wanted to go for a new look, I could remove the belt and wear a more fashionable one.

评论概述: Great quality, great fit, great material, just looks matronly on me
评论详情: It looked like this gorgeous classy vintage thing on the model but I look like a Hillary Clinton type when I wear it. No diss on Hillary Clinton types, I’m just younger and I wasn’t going for speaker at the conference, I was going for va-va-voom. It’s very professional though!

This dress was so cute and flattering on me aside from the top being too large. I'm a pear shaped and the top seemed to have more fabric to hold larger than a size 38c cup. I had to return it but if I had a slightly bigger chest or could sew I'd totally keep it.

I purchased this dress for a funeral that happened on a cold rainy day...the attached pictures are 6hrs AFTER the funeral and grocery shopping. My hunny really liked it and it was comfortable, flattering, easy to iron, dries fast and strechy.

I wore this dress as my wedding dress and received many compliments.  The material is sturdy and stretchy. It is comfortable. Size 14 and fits snug for curvy fit.

The MUXXN Women's Vintage Faux Wrap V Neck 3/4 Sleeve Formal Classic Party Work Dress with Belt is a beautiful piece that can be styled to look fashionable with the right accessories. While some people have complained about this dress, it's important to note that individual experiences may vary. The fabric is thick and stretchy, and although it's difficult to describe, it does feel warm in hot climates and pleasant in colder temperatures. Overall, I would recommend this dress to anyone.

The material is good. Lightweight, but firm and stretchy. It was not see through at all. But the shape of it did not work for me. I’m also only 4’10”, so most clothes don’t fit well, but it was very awkward for my body shape. Very disappointing, because I fell in love with the picture and the style. 评论概述: Love this dress - only minor issues

Overall, I love the fit and style, being a "bride" in her mid-50's.  I did purchase tape for the front flaps, but ran out of time to put it in.  The white is very sheer, so had to wear shapewear to keep my panties from showing.  Fabric is stretchy, a bit difficult to iron, and it wrinkles a bit, but I love it anyway.  :)  I purchased a small.  I am 5/8" 125 pounds and it definitely hugs the curves.  Great value for the price.

A BEAUTIFUL color of green!  I ordered an XL because I read it was fitting. In fact it has quite a bit of stretch and has a great fit and I could have probably gotten away with Large!  I ordered in 2 colors. Ended up returning it in Green.

This stylish dress fits well.  I did not have any problem with the bodice turning out as other people have reported.  I bought this dress and another color also because I liked the style.  I did return this one though because it is more of an orange color than a peach color.
dress fits pertectly
I like the color, the fabric of the dress. I should take it a biggest size, so the dress doesn’t wrinkle and looks a little loose from my hips and legs.

Fit perfectly. Looked great. Super comfy.

The fit was perfect, however in the bust / shoulder area it was a just a tad big, but not to bad. The length was perfect, not too long and not too short. My husband loved the way it hit all of my curves in all with right aspects without the support of spanx. However I did not like the bow, so I wore it without and it was just as pretty.  I highly recommend  this dress and will be purchasing in a different color.

Fit was great, material feels good but the breast area flips out a little so I kept adjusting it all night.

评论概述: Beautiful dress, not appropriate for my occasion
评论详情: measurements 46-35.5-45 I wanted to love this dress for a funeral. It felt great on. There's stretch, so it is comfortable. However, I had some issues. I am almost 6 foot tall w/ long legs. It was toooo short for a funeral setting for me. The slit in the skirt part was not in a good place should it ride up. I believe it would fit better in the chest/neckline w/ someone who has a smaller top than mine. The seam at crossover rolled over. For my height, it was above knee standing w/o heels. Loved the fabric, perfect balanced weight. I just wished it was little longer in length and that the chest seaming was more sturdy. (with heavier interfacing/stitches) ** absolutely Will be gorgeous on someone!

评论概述: Beautiful, stretchy, forgiving, size up (Asian sizing), get some fabric tape for the neckline
评论详情: This dress was gorgeous on and fit as expected (when purchasing 1-2 sizes up as an American wearing Asian sizing).  Purchased it for a local magazine shoot where we all had to “Go Red”.  Lots of ladies were rocking “Rent the Runway” but due to poor planning on my part I had to “Brave the Amazon”.  The dress had stretchy fabric that was thick enough to be forgiving and show no bumps or rolls when paired with some Spanx.  Hugged my curves and made me look very va-va-voom.  HOWEVER, invest in some double sided fabric tape if you are bothered by the two to three inches of “fabric flap” you get on the inside of the necklines on cheaper dresses.  On a crew neck the seams stay put and the flaps don’t ride up, but with this wrap neckline they don’t stay put and you get a lot of “fabric flap” creeping out.  (See pics) It gives the dress away as being on the lower end quality wise.  Fabric tape did the trick for the couple hours that I needed it to.  If the dress wasn’t for a photo shoot and maybe just a night out I probably wouldn’t be so nit-picky on it.  Three stars because of the neckline issue. If the flaps weren’t a problem I would give it five.
This dress fits nicely. The facing wants to turn out so I had to have it topped stitched down. Didn’t really need the belt but you have to wear it because of the loops.
Perfect fix

My first ever review but I have to said I absolutely love this sexy dress. I purchased it in red for this Valentine’s Day and it’s stunning on. Loved it so much, I have now reordered  and have received it in the following colors; peach, beige, gray, harbor blue and just ordered again today in black and pink! No joke!  And considering adding  white to my collection . Never in my life had I purchased more than one dress of the same style. But Ladies it looks great on !!

I am 5'7", about 150 pounds.  I purchased this dress for a business photo shoot.  I normally wear a medium, but I tried on both the medium and the large.  I could wear both but went with the large because I thought it fit a bit better and the neckline didn't flip over like some other reviewers mentioned. fabric is thick and stretchy but of you have a tummy or butt....its not flattering

评论概述: Lots of compliments, but spanx is a must

However it was somewhat sheer, and the fabric wasn’t as thick as I hoped. I think if this dress was a different color, it would t have been so bad. However, I did have the right Spanx to make everything look smooth. But I’ll admit that in some pictures, even from far away, I felt like my spanx weren’t thick enough because I feel like I could see my cellulite somehow. Even so, my butt looked good. So have some thicker shapewear and you’ll be good.
Really cute dress and good quality, just runs small.

I wore this dress in yellow to my niece’s graduation and I was an instant hit. I wore a size small and it fit perfectly hugging all the right places. The color was bright and perfect for spring. The material was thick enough to keep me comfortable in the chillier part of the day. Great buy👍🏽
Chic and comfortable! Forgiving fabric. 3/4 sleeves are flattering even for an XL girl like me. Well made! Arrived fast! Great price!!

I shouldn't say this because everyone will start buying them and they will sell out before i get more colors. This is a must have in everyone's closet. The fabic is very very nice and it fits just right on my curvy body. Slimming purple color. Don't wait buy this now!!!!!
I loved this dress! It fit great and was easy to accessorize.
Washed in cold water. Dried on delicate cycle.  It was really wrinkled. I put it on a higher dryer setting.  It still had wrinkles. I had to iron it. It looked good on.

I was devastated to have to return this dress. It is so well made and so figure flattering. The top is just slightly too large I am very "small on top" Im 5' 8" 36 30 40 and I weigh about 165.  The dress looked so amazing but other than being a tiny bit too lose around the chest area, even though I love 3/4 sleeves my arms are covered with tattoos and I figured the only place I would wear the dress to is the office and I didnt want to ruin the silhouette of the dress by putting a long sleeve sweater over it.  the material is great the shape is great the dress is hot stuff.
I bought this for my son’s wedding. Comfortable with some stretch to the fabric. I’m a size 6 and the small fit nicely.
It doesn't stretch but not much. It's pretty. I would buy it again but I would measure myself first.
Fabric is nice, it's comfortable. Would have given 5 stars but was missing the belt.

评论概述: Very Figure Flattering w a few drawbacks
评论详情: I bought a small and it fit perfect. I weigh 120lbs 5’5” .  Very cute /sexy dress ... fits nicely to show off your figure Ihowever it has a few draw backs as mentioned by other reviewers .  I had to pin my bra straps to the shoulders of the dress or my bra straps would show because it was a tad lose at the shoulders .’Also It came very wrinkled and it didn’t appear safe to iron .  I tried to iron w a cotton cloth over the top of the dress on a warm setting .  It helped but was still wrinkled .  It is a hand wash ,hang to dry or dry clean item .  I don’t do dry cleaners due to toxic chemicals used in the process ...so hand washing it is .  It is really is a very cute dress, very revealing in the breastage department . ;)

I had to return the first one because the zipper was defective. They sent me another one the next day. Great customer service and the dress looks amazing! I purchased the white one and I can't wait to wear it. Buy it , you won't regret!

So there was some confusion when I was reading the reviews for this dress alot of people said size up but then said the shoulders were on the larger size. I am short 4'10 130lb and larger bust. I was torn between a medium and a small.  I decided to do a small my normal size I buy because everyone was saying it had nice stretch. I am so happy I went with my gut and got a small it fit like a glove. When taking it out of the package I was scared it looked small but it had a nice long zipper and the stretch made it hug my body in all the right places. The shoulders fit not too big at all and yes the front slides up but I still gave it 5 starts because I knew that was a problem already so I had already bought the fabric tape. The dress is made really nice fabric is thick but stretch not cheap looking at all a very nice tailored look once you take the chest part down.

评论概述: If you’re curvy order a size larger
评论详情: I read the reviews and sized up as recommended. The dress fits almost perfectly. I normally wear a large, ordered an extra large. Sliding it over my hips was a little tight but thanks to the fabric being somewhat stretchy I was able to get the dress passed my hips. The shoulders are a bit wide but not too bad and the fabric flaps on the inside of the dress can be managed with some double sided tape. Overall it’s a beautiful dress.

评论概述: The material is nice and thick.  Love the neck line.  Very classy.

I got this dress in two sizes small (1st pics) and medium (2nd pics) I am 138 lbs 5’5. I normally wear mediums to larges in most dresses. I ended up fitting much better in the small and didn’t have the problem of my shoulders falling down so often and the bust fit me much better, I think it’s meant to just be tight fitting. I have bigger arms and both gave me ample room in the arm and the pleating around the stomach is very flattering for those of us with a little belly. The material has a lot of give and it’s a very nice weight, the design is cute. If you’re having issues with the lining poking out and the bust dropping too low you can fix it with some iron on hemming tape and a small stay stitch at the desired place for the bust or if you don’t like sewing you could use some garment tape. Super cute I’ll be getting more from them soon! 🙂

I love this dress. I just took it out of the package so it’s wrinkly. I’m wearing to a June wedding. Nice and thick. Stretchy fabric. Very nice quality. Figure flattering. Will dress up the bow with a broach.

评论概述: Great fit , material & price !!! Love it
评论详情: I love this dress !!! It fits perfectly- I have a hard time with dresses because I’m large breasted so to find something that fits all over is great , I usually have to have alterations done . Then the style is so fun , retro 50’s style ( which I love ) classic look that you can wear anytime . The fabric is very soft and the Belt/ sash gives it a nice touch . The only thing is I will need two sided tape designed for this very thing , as other reviews pointed out the top of the dress at the cleavage turns out - doesn’t stay in place but the tape takes care of it easily enough . The price is great !!! All & all you can’t go wrong with this dress . For ref I am 5’7 150lb Wear 40B bra. I bought the brown to wear for Thanksgiving mass but I’ll definitely be buying another of the many colors offered .

The dress fit very well. I’m on the kinda of the fence about the fabric !!! It did not steam well at all and it wrinkled terribly after sitting for a while. It was comfortable to wear.  I’m 5’6” & it hit below my knees which was fine for me. The other negative thing was it didn’t want to lay properly across the chest !!! I’m a 36g so I was constantly adjusting it , it wasn’t  too small, xxl. In fact I could have gone with an xl. I normally wear a 14. But I wasn’t sure how this fabric would wear. So I would love to have the same type of dress in a different type of fabric. I think it would do well. But for the price I can’t complain too much !!! My daughter liked it and she’s  a children’s wear designer, so if it gave it her thumbs up it had to be okay !!! Wore it to a Bday party, didn’t want to spend a lot of money on a dress for.So it worked.
I am 5'6 , 172 lbs. I will recommend size XL.

Love this company, love this fabric. It's a thick, stretchy fabric,  that clings to your body. I understand about the front and back being low cut, the dress can fall off your shoulders, but you can put a brooch on it. I put 3 snowflake broaches on it and wore it for Christmas, or as someone said a stitch or even string pearls across the front to hold it together, which is what I did. It looks great, fits like a glove. Impossible to find something that fits that well for this price

Great strong, expensive looking stretchy fabric. I’m 5’8” 140 lbs. Selected a size Medium. Hourglass shape. Fits perfectly. The top does want to flip out & show the underside lining, like in other comments, so I use double sided tape. No issues at all with the top flipping out using that.
Size up however it is beautiful
Stunning dress. Extremely comfortable and well made. Hugged perfectly in all the right places. In love with it.

cannot get over the quality of this dress! The material is thick and soft, the seaming and detailing are top notch! I’m between dress sizes usually large and medium so to be safe I bought the large, it fits beautifully with a extra room, I may try a medium in a different color just to see. But if you’re considering this dress at all DO NOT HESITATE!  This is perfect for work, cocktails, evening events, etc. For fit reference I am 6 ft tall, 159lbs, 36DDD and the large fit to mid knee with room to move around in, I was worried about the sleeves being too shot or tight (the always are on me) there’s enough room for me that I could’ve bought a med for sure.
When wearing this dress, be careful that your support garments don't cause the dress the "ride up" Outside of that issue It's a beautiful dress
I have a very curvy body, this dress looks like a million bucks on.  It was inexpensive. Not my favorite fabric, but looks great.

Shows your curves but classy to wear to work. 5’7” 174lbs, 36DDD (I did wear a minimizer bra) and fit great.  Got a size Large-due to my bust. It has stretch and I could have gotten a medium but it held my curves. The neck line where it folds under will pull out a bit if you’re doing a lot of physical stuff.  Not lined but not needed. Love the pencil skirt! Lots of compliments! Definitely like colored belts with this!

Purchased this dress for my wedding and was mostly satisfied. The material doesnt require ironing (you can't anyway) and is comfortable to wear ( unless you wear stockings and spanx... then things get difficult). At 5'6 165lbs (mostly bust) I'm a 34hh, 30in waist  and not hippy at all. The only negative was that the seam the runs along the v neck isnt a seam at all and kept coming undone. It drove me insane all day, I noted this issue when I read the reviews and forgot to purchase double sided tape.... save yourself and purchase some tape. All in all my husband thought I was stunning and I do plan on purchasing another color.
The fit, style thickness and coverage is fabulous.

I ordered this dress to meet me in the USA for my grandma’s funeral, and was pleasantly surprised by the quality of it. I loved everything about this dress. I ordered it in a size small and it fit perfectly. I took the advice of other review about the seam flipping over, so I used fashion tape. Worked perfectly to fix the issue. The material of the dress is great quality.
Good dress for the price.

I absolutely love this dress!! I am ordering in additional colors now. I’m about 5’7, 190lbs, and usually wear a large but ordered an extra large and it fit perfect. Soo cute!! If you’re on the fence, get it!

Seemed like a nice dress that was made well.  The style is such that it needs to fit perfectly to look right.  As others have indicated, the top did not fit right and it did not hang right.I needed it for one event, but it seems like it would work as a professional dress.  It may be possible to take it to a tailor to adjust the shoulders, but I didn't have the desire.  The fabric is thick and stretchy, and would have been nice if it fit better.

This dress is a great find. It offers a perfect blend of style, comfort, and versatility, making it an excellent addition to any wardrobe. Highly recommended for anyone looking for a chic and flattering dress for various occasions.

I love the look and style of this dress. It’s classy, sophisticated and just ever so sexy. The material has a slight sheen to it, which I actually liked. I ordered a medium, I’m 5’5 and about 140lbs. The bottom part of the dress fit perfect, it looks amazing. But the top is so oversized that the shoulder don’t even stay in place. I would almost say the top part is a size Large or XL. It’s very strange. Im debating between returning it or trying to go to a tailor. There are darts up the back, so I think it may be able to fix.
The fabric ,style,and color is just so wonderfully made and worked well together.

Purchased dress for my daughter’s graduation and received so many compliments. Such a flattering dress. I’m considering buying in other colors to have on hand. My only complaint is excess material in neckline that doesn’t lay quite right. I ironed that portion and held up ok but by end of the day is was starting to show. The next time I wear this dress, I’ll use a little fashion tape. Fits as expected. I’m 5,5 and 143lbs ordered a medium and it fit perfectly.

评论概述: I have a new go-to black dress!
评论详情: I have to say this is currently one my favorite dresses in my closet right now. I am 5’4” weigh 166 and with 36 DD chest. I’m curvy and wide at the hips. I purchased a size 12/Large. I decided to just go with my true size and it fits perfect. At first I thought it was too snug because I needed a bit of assistance with the zipper but after getting zipped and arranging and fixing the dress properly it wasn’t too snug at all. It fit just right. My girls aren’t spilling out and it all just has such a classy vintage feel to it. The material has stretch to it so it kind of just hugs you in the right places and hides some of that mommy pooch.  I purchased the black one for an April wedding in a few weeks. Love this dress!!!

评论概述: Cute, but fit a little weird.

I don't have a large bust, and I have pretty narrow shoulders, so this may not be a problem for most people. Overall, the dress was a good quality material, but easily wrinkled. I ironed it a little before the wedding and parts of it were still wrinkled. Good stretch and easy to move in.

I wanted to love this dress but it runs really small. This is the first dress from this brand that was too small. I own 6 to 7 other dress in the same size and they fit very nicely. I am very sad. Will have to return
This dress fit perfectly, wore it it to my court wedding and felt great in it…very classy! The chart size was accurate and it has stretch.

The material is nice and overall it’s a nice dress. It also fits pretty well in terms of overall size. There are a few things though: it is too large in the shoulders which makes it uncomfortable because it makes the bust too large and fabric doesn’t sit at your arms properly and the flap of fabric at the front keeps folding up due to this.  I’m still deciding if I want to keep this dress or return it. I might end up hemming the shoulders myself to fix this problem.
Got this for a work event, looks very nice. Ironed on low to medium, low steam, worked fine. Will probably get another in a different color.
